Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.race_results

Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.race_results.Race

  • public class Race
extends java.util.Observable
    A representation of a Race in the WolfResultsManager application.
    Author:
    Bilal Mohamad, Marwah Mahate

    • Constructor Detail

      • Race

        public Race​(java.lang.String name,
            double distance,
            java.time.LocalDate date,
            java.lang.String location,
            RaceResultList results)
        The constructor used for creating a Race object. The results instance variable will be set to the existing entered results.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the race
        distance - the distance of the race
        date - the date of the race
        location - the location of the race
        results - the list of results of the race
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null, empty, or all whitespace distance is non-positive date is null location is null results is null

      • Race

        public Race​(java.lang.String name,
            double distance,
            java.time.LocalDate date,
            java.lang.String location)
        The constructor used for creating a Race object. The results instance variable will be set to a new RaceResultList
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the race
        distance - the distance of the race
        date - the date of the race
        location - the location of the race
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is empty, null, or all whitespace distance is non-positive date is null location is null

        public void addIndividualResult​(IndividualResult result)

        Parameters:

      • setDistance

        public void setDistance​(double distance)
        Sets the distance to the entered distance. Observers of Race are notified of the change.
        Parameters:
        distance - the value to set the distance to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the distance is non-positive

      • filter

        public RaceResultList filter​(int minAge,
                             int maxAge,
                             java.lang.String minPace,
                             java.lang.String maxPace)
        Creates a RaceResultList of all the runners that are in between the minAge and maxAge range and the minPace and maxPace range.
        Parameters:
        minAge - the lower bound of the age range
        maxAge - the upper bound of the age range
        minPace - the lower bound of the pace range
        maxPace - the upper bound of the pace range
        Returns:
        a list of the results such that the runner's age is between minAge and maxAge (inclusive) and pace is between minPace and maxPace (inclusive)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        The string representation of a Race is the name, distance, date, and location fields in the format: NAME (DISTANCE miles) on DATE at LOCATION
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string representation of a race

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode​()
        Hashes the entered data using the hash algorithm. Based on the name, distance, date, and location fields.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the hashed information

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares the current object with the entered object. If they are equals then it will return true otherwise false. Based on the name, distance, date, and location fields.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
